mapper.sql: ID, CREATEUSER, DAMAGEDDESCRIBE, CREATETIME, CHECKUSER, CHECKDESCRIBE, CHECKTIME, REMARKS, DELSTATUS, QTY, CHECKFLAG
mapper.select:
select c.ID, c.CREATEUSER, c.DAMAGEDDESCRIBE, c.CREATETIME, c.CHECKUSER, c.CHECKDESCRIBE, c.CHECKTIME, c.REMARKS, c.DELSTATUS, c.QTY, c.CHECKFLAG,decode(c.checkflag,'10','新增','20','审核通过','30','审核驳回','新增') as checkflagname, u1.username as createusername,u2.username as checkusername from T_WMS_MACHINEDAMAGED c left outer join t_sys_user u1 on c.createuser=u1.id left outer join t_sys_user u2 on c.checkuser=u2.id where c.DELSTATUS='10'
AND (u1.username like '%'||#{param.keyword}||'%' or u2.username like '%'||#{param.keyword}||'%')
mapper.insert: insert into T_WMS_MACHINEDAMAGED (ID, CREATEUSER, DAMAGEDDESCRIBE, CREATETIME, CHECKUSER, CHECKDESCRIBE, CHECKTIME, REMARKS, DELSTATUS, QTY, CHECKFLAG) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createuser,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{damageddescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{checkuser,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{checkdescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{checkflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into T_WMS_MACHINEDAMAGED
ID,
CREATEUSER,
DAMAGEDDESCRIBE,
CREATETIME,
CHECKUSER,
CHECKDESCRIBE,
CHECKTIME,
REMARKS,
DELSTATUS,
QTY,
CHECKFLAG,
#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{createuser,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{damageddescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sysdate,
#{checkuser,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{checkdescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{checktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
'10',
#{qty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
'10',
mapper.update:
update T_WMS_MACHINEDAMAGED
CREATEUSER = #{createuser,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DAMAGEDDESCRIBE = #{damageddescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CHECKUSER = #{checkuser,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHECKDESCRIBE = #{checkdescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHECKTIME = #{checktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELSTATUS = #{delstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QTY = QTY + #{qty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHECKFLAG = #{checkflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update T_WMS_MACHINEDAMAGED set CREATEUSER = #{createuser,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DAMAGEDDESCRIBE = #{damageddescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CHECKUSER = #{checkuser,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHECKDESCRIBE = #{checkdescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECKTIME = #{checktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELSTATUS = #{delstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QTY = #{qty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHECKFLAG = #{checkflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
